title: Simulation
description: Simulation configuration schema. Specify an experiment using multiple engines and transceiver functions.

SimulationTimeout.description: Experiment Timeout (in seconds). It refers to simulation time. 0 means no timeout

SimulationTimestep.description: Time in seconds the simulation advances in each Simulation Loop

DeviceHandle.description: Framework used to process and rely device data between engines. Available options are the TF framework (tf) and Computation Graph (cg)

ProcessLauncherType.description: ProcessLauncher type to be used for launching engine processes

EngineConfigs.description: Engines that will be started in the experiment

TransceiverFunctionConfigs.description: Transceiver functions that will be used in the experiment

ComputationalGraph.description: List of filenames describing the ComputationalGraph

PreprocessingFunctionConfigs.description: Preprocessing functions that will be used in the experiment
